Title: Establishes a personal income tax credit for tolls paid by resident taxpayers during the course of commuting to and from their place of employment
Summary: Establishes a personal income tax credit for tolls paid by resident taxpayers during the course of commuting to and from their place of employment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a personal income tax credit for tolls paid by a taxpayer in the course of commuting to and from his or her place of employment
